Question: Lenovo CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lenovo

Product Highlights at CES 2024

- Lenovo unveiled a range of devices including the Yoga Book 9i, Yoga AIO 9i, Yoga Slim 6i, Yoga 9i, ThinkBook Plus, ThinkPad Plus, ThinkBook 16p Gen 4, ThinkCentre neo 50q, Lenovo Legion Pro 7 and 7i, Lenovo Legion Tower 7i and 5i, ThinkPad X1, ThinkPhone by Motorola, IdeaPad Pro 5i, ThinkVision monitors, and Legion Tower 5i and 5.

- The new devices feature the latest Intel Core and AMD Ryzen processors, NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, AI-powered performance, OLED displays, and innovative designs to cater to different user needs, from business to gaming and entertainment.

- Lenovo also introduced AI-powered features, sustainable design elements, and accessories such as the Lenovo Magic Bay Studio, Mechanical Energy Harvesting Combo, and Lenovo USB-C Dual Display Travel Dock & Lenovo Wireless VoIP Headset to enhance productivity in the modern hybrid workplace.
Summary_cn:
联想

2024年CES产品亮点

- 联想推出了一系列设备，包括Yoga Book 9i、Yoga AIO 9i、Yoga Slim 6i、Yoga 9i、ThinkBook Plus、ThinkPad Plus、ThinkBook 16p Gen 4、ThinkCentre neo 50q、联想Legion Pro 7和7i、联想Legion Tower 7i和5i、ThinkPad X1、ThinkPhone by Motorola、IdeaPad Pro 5i、ThinkVision显示器以及Legion Tower 5i和5等。

- 这些新设备采用了最新的英特尔Core和AMD Ryzen处理器、NVIDIA GeForce RTX图形、人工智能驱动的性能、OLED显示屏和创新设计，以满足不同用户的需求，从商务到游戏和娱乐。

- 联想还推出了人工智能驱动的功能、可持续性设计元素和配件，如联想Magic Bay Studio、机械能采集组合、联想USB-C双显示器旅行坞和联想无线VoIP耳机，以提高现代混合工作场所的生产力。
